pages.text: $(li)The Illager Centre is a big castle that can be found over the Overworld where Illagers save their big treasure, the $(l:patchouli:potions/illagers/holy_water)Holy Water$(/l).$(br)$(li)$(l:patchouli:illagers/pillager)Pillagers$(/l), $(l:patchouli:illagers/furantur)Furanturs$(/l), $(l:patchouli:illagers/witch)Witches$(/l), and a $(l:patchouli:illagers/black_iron_golem)Black Iron Golem$(/l) this place.
